QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, encid, drug as source_value, encounterdate, 32858 type_concept_id, 0 source_concept_id, case when drug='aducanumab' then 1537087 when drug='aduhelm' then 1537087 when drug='aricept' then 715997 when drug='brexpiprazole' then 46275300 when drug='donanemab' then 1734796 when drug='donepezil' then 715997 when drug='donepezil / memantine' then 715997 when drug='donepezil / memantine' then 701322 when drug='exelon' then 733523 when drug='galantamine' then 757627 when drug='gantenerumab' then 36851650 when drug='kisunla' then 1734796 when drug='lecanemab' then 1301377 when drug='leqembi' then 1301377 when drug='memantine' then 701322 when drug='namenda' then 701322 when drug='namzaric' then 715997 when drug='namzaric' then 701322 when drug='razadyne' then 757627 when drug='rexulti' then 46275300 when drug='risvastigmine' then 733523 end as concept_id FROM {sc}.alz_medication l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
